sentences.en: A study on diagnosing of attention deficit hyperactivity disorder in children by using different methods.
sentences.cn: 与儿童注意缺陷多动障碍的几种诊断方法探讨>>相似的文献.

sentences.en: Do you suffer from hyperactivity? Can you be quiet for just a moment , please!
sentences.cn: 你怎么像是有多动症啊,一刻都不得消停.

sentences.en: He Shumin, vice director of pediatric physicians. Specializes in newborn, child psychology, hyperactivity rehabilitation treatment.
sentences.cn: 何淑敏儿科副主任医师. 擅长新生儿 、 儿童心理 、 多动症康复的治疗.

sentences.en: Hyperactivity, pharynx pain, aphonia: Sydney Daozhi slowly with the pharynx, daily for 3 ~ 4 times.
sentences.cn: 肺热 、 咽疼 、 失音: 雪梨捣汁徐徐含咽, 每日服3~4次.

sentences.en: It can also cause masticatory muscle dysfunction, such as the masticatory muscle hyperactivity, convulsions, fatigue, pain.
sentences.cn: 它又可引起咀嚼肌功能异常, 如咀嚼肌功能亢进 、 痉挛 、 疲乏 、 疼痛等.

sentences.en: Karen complained of hyperactivity and rest-lessness.
sentences.cn: 卡伦诉说自己有多动、焦躁不安的问题。

sentences.en: Many children have a wheat intolerance which can cause hyperactivity.
sentences.cn: 许多小朋友是因为无法忍受小麦而致引起过动的.

sentences.en: Mr Sarkozy's hyperactivity has made him look like a buffoon.
sentences.cn: 萨科齐的极度活跃让他看起来像个小丑.

sentences.en: My youngest son has a problem of hyperactivity.
sentences.cn: 我最小的儿子有多动症。

sentences.en: Objective To explore the temperament characteristic of attention deficit hyperactivity disorder ( ADHD ) children and psychology therapy.
sentences.cn: 目的探讨注意缺陷多动障碍 ( ADHD ) 儿童的气质特征及心理治疗.

sentences.en: Postpartum depression, attention deficit hyperactivity disorder , and low IQs are all linked to low DHA levels.
sentences.cn: 产后情绪低落, 精神不振并且IQ不高与DHA的水平有关.

sentences.en: Sensitization can also result from CNS changes that lead to hyperactivity of pain - transmission pathways.
sentences.cn: 敏感化还可能是因为中枢神经系统的变化,导致痛觉传递路径的活性增强.

sentences.en: Simply getting a good night's sleep could reduce levels of hyperactivity and bad behaviour among children, a Finnish study reports.
sentences.cn: 一项芬兰研究显示，好的睡眠可以简单的降低孩子们过度活动和不好的行为。

sentences.en: The pelvis first shows evidence of hyperactivity and hypertrophy and then progressive dilatation and atony.
sentences.cn: 肾盂早期表现是蠕动增强及肥厚,以后逐渐扩大及无张力.

sentences.en: To analysis the neuropsychological characteristics of different subtypes of attention deficit hyperactivity disorder ( ADHD ).
sentences.cn: 分析注意缺陷多动障碍 ( ADHD ) 儿童不同亚型的神经心理特征.

words.tran_cn: 极度活跃的；活动过度的
